name: express_server
description: express server to serve and let users download web ui designs code

scripts.dev: docker run -it --rm -v $PWD/:/server -w /server --net host --name node_server node:latest sh -c "npm i pm2 -g && /bin/bash"
scripts.bun-dev: docker run -it --rm --init --ulimit memlock=-1:-1 -v $PWD/:/server -w /server --net host --name bun_server oven/bun:latest sh -c "/bin/bash"
scripts.cert: docker run --rm  -v $PWD/cert:/etc/letsencrypt  -p 80:80 -it certbot/certbot certonly --standalone --email YOUR_EMAIL@gmail.com --agree-tos --preferred-challenges http -d YOUR_DOMAIN.com

author: Andrew Yu
